product_name: REI Sahara Shirt - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Worn and tested by REI Adventures guides, the plus-size REI Sahara is a travel-ready shirt with details galore that help keep you cool and comfortable in warm, sunny climates. Lightweight micro-ripstop nylon wicks moisture, dries incredibly fast, is easy-care and delivers very good sun protection with a 40 UPF rating; also resists pilling. Collar unfolds for added sun protection and secures with rip-and-stick tabs when you don't want it up. Back cape vent and zip side vents offer built-in cooling; vents are placed to clear pack straps. Centered pleat at back yoke hem frees movement. Moisture-wicking mesh lines collar stand, shoulder yoke and side-seam vents. Long sleeves with button cuffs shield skin from the hot sun; tabs secure rolled-up sleeves. Sunglass loop at left chest. Hidden zippered pocket at left chest stows credit cards and currency.
